All Product Information Customer Q&A's Customer Reviews

Product description

Easton S400 Join The Speed Brigade Easton S400 baseball bats are crafted from a durable aluminum alloy. This enables Easton to create a powerful bat with a light swing weight and a large sweet spot in an evenly balanced design. Easton S400 Durable aluminum alloy 31/32" tapered handle with All Sports grip 2 5/8" barrel 1-Year Warranty Length/Weight (-3): 30"-27 oz A* 31"-28 oz A* 32"-29 oz A* 33"-30 oz A* 34"-31 oz *Note: MINUS (-) DROP: Refers to the differential between the length and weight of a bat. As an example a (-)10 bat would be a 29" length 19 oz weight bat. Easton...For Athletes Who Know The Difference

Top customer reviews

5.0 out of 5 starsSolid bat with nice pop
ByCalico Smithon April 19, 2016
Size: 33"/30 oz|Verified Purchase
This is a very solid bat with lots of pop. I play in an adult baseball league and really love this bat. There is no ping like you heard in the old metal bat days. Just a nice solid sound when you hit the ball. The ball seems to jump off this bat. I play with guys that use more expensive bats and I have used them, but those bats seem dead when hitting the ball. I am debating buying another one of these as I enjoy them so much.
Read more

Byrubbernutson July 16, 2017
Size: 33"/30 oz|Verified Purchase
I know an old model, but Son knocks the cover off the ball with this bat. It's a bat. I know ...I know ...this review is not helpful, but I have no scientific method of telling you how good this bat is compared to others.
